name: You
summary: You. Actress: Nobody Knows. You was born on 29 August 1964 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Nobody Knows (2004), Still Walking (2008) and High & Low: The Movie 3 - Final Mission (2017). She was previously married to Shunsuke Matsuoka and Minoru Tezuka.
